website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for anyone who wants an effortless keratin treatment without spending a lot of money.
pros: Offers all the benefits consumers love in an easy-to-apply leave-in formula
Balances protein and hydration for added volume and control
A little goes a long way
cons: Some testers found that applying too much leaves a sticky residue, but this is easily corrected by using it sparingly

customer_reviews.title: Different formulation??
customer_reviews.text: The real product gets more stars than this but the review if for the product I received. I don't believe it was authentic because the ingredients don't match the products I have been getting from both target and ulta. They don't even match what's posted here on the site. I'm not taking a risk with my hair although I'm not 100% sure it's not real. The photo I attached shows a bottle from Target's ingredients on yhe left and the bottle I received from Amazon on the right. As you can see, the ingredients are different and in different concentrations if you go based on the order.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product. DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years now and the original product works wonders for bleached hair but this IS NOT legit. Completely wrong consistency and smell. The original is a spray and usually leaves my hair smooth and hydrated. They seemed to have just emptied the bottle and filled with his a conditioner or cream. Just putting it on my hand left it oily and smelled completely off. Will not try this on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: victor heras

customer_reviews.title: Product worked differently compared to prior retail store purchase
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other purchasers reviews about this product. I have purchased from retail stores in the past and it worked great. The product I received from this purchase did not seem to be the same formula at all. Product was very heavy, weighed my hair down as well as making it feel extremely greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim1972

customer_reviews.title: Fake !!! It’s a 10 bottle filled with a different product
customer_reviews.text: I have used the it’s a 10 product line for many years and have always loved it. One of my favorite things about this product is the way it smells so good when I spray it in my hair. When I ordered this product and received it in the mail it was sealed with a handmade sticker. I was able to look past that but the dead giveaway that this product was fake was when I sprayed it in my hair. This is not a real it’s a 10 product It has been filled with something else. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy...
customer_reviews.text: Order this condition for my hair while on vacation. Got all the way out the country to learn the spray pump was damaged. Can not use it. Upset because it's not returnable
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product I've loved for years.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with several of the other reviewers. I've used this product for years and loved it. When I was running low of the product, I ordered a new bottle from this vendor. Unfortunately, I didn't unwrap the new bottle until I finished my previous bottle. The product from this vendor would not spray. When I opened the bottle the contents were thick - more like a viscus lotion. Of course, it didn't spray or look anything like the product I had been using for years. I think it was a knock off or had been subjected to adverse conditions that changed the consistency. Needless to say, I'm not going to apply it to my hair even if I could.
customer_reviews.author: susierog

customer_reviews.title: A must for grey, dry, coarse hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few years. I wash my hair every 2 or 3 days and use this after every wash. 1 of these bottles last me about 1 year. I have long, very coarse, thick, frizzy hair that is colored. I went grey at 20 so my hair is not soft and beautiful naturally. I put 2 pumps on the mid-length to ends before drying. This, along with the "It's a 10" leave-in conditioner helps my hair be manageable. Without either of them I couldn't tolerate my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft shiny hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My hair is a bit wavy. Just two small sprays with this, after shampooing, and my hair is silky smooth, easy to comb and still is easy to curl or straighten. I've found it's best not to shake it as the amount of gel in the spray increases. The light spray is perfect for my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good shine, nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I would call this a miracle product. It added a good amount of shine to my hair and helped with detangling. If used sparingly it also didn't feel like it weighed my hair down too much. I have hair that tends to be a little frizzy and can curl but isn't too badly behaved in the grand scheme of things. My advice is to not spray this straight on your hair but to instead spray it onto your hands. Then run your hands through your hair to work the product through, I scrunched mine in. It seems to keep it from being too heavy if applied that way.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hoover

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE PRICE FOR REAL THING!
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without it! AMAZON had it in bulk for a great much lower price and it is the original genuine It's a 10 product. One thing I won't do is cut corners or go generic when it comes to health, beauty and my hair. I was skeptical at first, but this is the only thing I use. When I used it was the same product I paid twenty dollars for at the beauty store. Hope they keep selling at low prices in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Berlin S.

customer_reviews.title: Same product, now travel size!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years on the recommendation of my nearly life-long hair stylist. I have thick hair as well as straight bangs, a la Zooey Deschanel. I spray this on my bangs every time before I blow dry them. I blow dry my now six-year-old bangs after every time I shower. If I'm not doing more styling, I spray this over the entirety of my hair. It has been working great for years. I am always told a have very healthy hair especially since I have switched stylists and moved cities.
customer_reviews.author: Maree LaRue

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake and will cause your hair to break!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake. It really made my hair soft and I was thrilled. But I noticed my hair was breaking a lot. After a month, the spray actually congealed and I had to dump it in my hand because it would no longer spray. I put it on my hair and my hair began shedding in my hands. This was last night!! If you look at the pictures on Amazon’s website, you can see how phony they are. The picture with the contents is not clear and I don’t believe a professional company would provide displays like that. I only wish I would have been more observant.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraThings

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake! Beware.. it’s not the real product. It made my hair dry and so bad... I read the other reviews and thought maybe it’s just that they got the wrong bottle.. I know silly.. but no.. the product is literally so different from the original.. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 teen swimmers with long hair, being in chlorine all the time dries out their hair, not to mention that being up in cap causes rips and tangles. This stuff was recommended by their hairdresser, it's LITERALLY A MIRACLE! Their hair has remained soft and strong! Smells good too! Spray 1-2 squirts, then massage gently to spread. Brush it out and dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Color Treated Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! My stylist used it on my hair after I got my roots bleached and I loved it so much that I found it on amazon and ordered it. A lot cheaper than in the salon too! I color treat my hair a ton and this is one of the only products that make my hair silky smooth after I shower! My hair feels so much healthier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great product... but like original better
customer_reviews.text: The texture of this product seems thinner than the original and for some reason I feel as though it doesn't hydrate as well as the original either. I understand that there is keratin in this which will of course change consistency, but I was definitely thinking this was going to just be an added benefit, not a significant change in product. GREAT product, but the original its a 10 is what I'll be going back to.
customer_reviews.author: a.albertine

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. My hair is naturally curly, dry and turning gray, not a good combo. Its dry and brittle, half curly, half straight, and frizzy, just sad. I tried so many products, most did nothing but weighed my hair down and looked awful. I was about to give up. I decided to try this and WOW. One use and the curls are back, the hair is soft and looks so much better! I LOVE this product. So glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: 1had2comment

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for tender-headed people.
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this product to me because I was complaining of dry tangled hair. I was skeptical that using this would make my hair oily, but it just makes my hair feel soooo soft! As an added bonus, my boyfriend can’t stop smelling my hair when I use this because it smells so nice. I haven’t been able to brush my hair while it was wet in years because I am so tender headed, but this product does wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Hanah Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I’ve been using it for years. My hair is fine and I live in Florida. Between those two things it’s very pretty. The keratin treatment in this product helps to smooth the cuticle.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor review due to the fact that the bottle is defective and spray won’t work. Item is no longer refundable so I’m stuck with a $14 bottle that I can’t use. Amazon offered $5 compensation - big whoop!
customer_reviews.author: Kauai17

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase. I love this stuff, I use it as soon as I get out of shower. It makes my thick hair so soft and manageable when I blow dry. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammey

customer_reviews.title: Want great hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product over several years and will continue. I have fine hair and this makes my hair so soft. When my daughter fixes my hair she always mentions how soft my hair is. I have medium length hair and it's pretty healthy. I do not dry or put hot irons in my hair daily so that also helps. Every other month an all over cut just to keep it healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Typical It's a 10. This review is to simply validate the product from the shipper.
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review because I found many sellers on here that offered a cheaper price but many complaints that they felt the product wasn't authentic or even diluted. This seller, so far, has sold an authentic product. This product keeps my sons curls shiny and smooth. He is an outdoor baby and needs a solid conditioning system. I'm happy with the product from them.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene H

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bleach colored hair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bleach colored hair, it had prevent further breakage and allow me to blow dry my hair without the fizz. I've been having terrible regret for my damaged hair and this product is the only thing keeping me sane right now. Between this and the deep conditioned keratin conditioner, I'm not sure which one I love more. Very light on your hair, smells amazing, moisturizes and keep my frizzy breakage presentable and at bay. Only thing preventing me from shaving my head and starting over. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this product due to the reviews saying it wasn’t the real product but I gave it a shot due to the great price. I am pleased to report that it came fully sealed and the pump released air the first two pumps so I know it is new. I have been using the product and it smells great and not watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Part of my new hair regimen
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying this product because my hair is very fine and gets oily easily. I am sooo glad I did. I use Yes to Carrots shampoo with keratin, followed by a light spritz of this product when my hair is dry to control any flyaways. My hair just gets a gentle sheen and stays smoothed from the moment of application. It doesn’t get greasy at all! One of my favorite new hair products in my regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra K.

customer_reviews.title: Short curly, sometimes frizzy, hair
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair that tends to frizz with the slightest dampness or humidity. Spending winters in the south and winters in the east I find it is a must to keep my hair smooth and in great condition. Also I wear my hair short and use a mini flat iron for the front, with a bit of extra 10 to help keep my hair from drying out in that one area. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria13

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me and product label was obscured
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice a difference at all when I used this product. I’ve found better products out there for the same price. Also, the bottle arrived with a huge sticker on it with the same and product code which I couldn’t remove. It covered all of the back so I couldn’t see any of the information on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: can't live without this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: ...but seriously ... IT'S GREAT! I went without it for a month or two and WOW... My hair just wasn't the same! This is one of my fave hair products and I'm thinking I really would like to try some of their other products. I mean, if this one is that great, what can their other products do?! It really helps keep my hair smooth and less frizz. I use it sparingly because my hair is kind of thin but I have LOTS of it - so too much can really weight it down. I've tried to creme versions and they aren't as good as this spray, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Literally a miracle!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING. I washed my hair, used my regular rinse-out conditioner, then sprayed this stuff in my hair before blow drying. While drying my hair I literally said to myself "oh my god it's a miracle." I have a lot of long, fine hair and even hairdressers have commented on how tangly my hair gets. It's a nest and because of it, gets broken so easily and is really frizzy. After spraying it in my wet hair, I COULD ACTUALLY RUN A COMB THROUGH IT! I highly highly recommend this. I will never use anything else every again!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: The savior of dry and damaged hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: The savior of dry-ass hair. I’ve been dying my hair twice a year for years now. This is the holy grail that keeps my hair from frizzing out and turning into a complete broom. I love the smell and a little goes a long way. My mother who has been perming and dying her hair for years also loved it after trying mine over Christmas. I ended up getting her some too!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great but look out do not spray to much learned that the hard way I have fine blonde hair and i looked like a grease monkey! I had to rewash my hair and start over. once i used the proper about maybe one spritz per side and in back it was great
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Gdowski

customer_reviews.title: is my favorite. Pros
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, coarse hair. I have used many products. This, by far, is my favorite. Pros: Makes my hair feel silky Easy to use Smells good Cons: I really cannot think of any cons...and I've tried. I will purchase this over others every time.
customer_reviews.author: AuroraBorealis

customer_reviews.title: Received USED product, bottle scuffed, missing product
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was sticky and very scuffed up. Bottle was only filled about 80% I'm pretty sure someone used and returned this bottle or someone got it dumpster diving. Very unhappy. This was supposed to be new product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good shine
customer_reviews.text: Like the way this product makes my blond highlights on dark hair shine. It really softens your hair so if you need a bit more body you have to use a thickening product. Using both in combination I like the way this product makes my hair shine.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this works so well on some people's hair and not mine but it made it feel coarse thick and gritty.i have other products from this line that I love and have heard good things about this one. This is just not for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Thedrakes

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: My hair has grown to be very long (down to my waist) & I'm always searching for ways to ensure it stays healthy, especially the ends. I really love this product, although it can be a bit pricey, I definitely think it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The best product you can use for repair for your hair
customer_reviews.text: The best product you can use for repair for your hair! The Keratin had most definitely made my hair grow longer, healthier, look smoother, and thicker. It helps prevent damage. I have color treated hair from highlighting at the salon. My hairdresser used this on my hair and I loved how it smelled. The ordered a bottle from Amazon and have continued to use it since I have notice the results.
customer_reviews.author: carisa Bare

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair so soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help with the static that I experience because of my dry skin and hair (and the fact that I live in Wisconsin and our winters create static in everything). This product leaves my hair very soft and has helped reduce the static. It was also a fraction of the price that it is at my salon.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bud

customer_reviews.title: super thick and naturally curly
customer_reviews.text: This is a part of my hair care routine. I get keratin treatments every three months and this helps extend those treatments. I apply two squirts to each side and then the back, two squirts underneath and then comb through. My hair is mid back length, super thick and naturally curly. My hair is much softer when I use this product. One word of caution... DO NOT allow the overspray to get on your tile floor. It will make it dangerously slippery. I made that mistake twice. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Shop-Til-You-Drop

customer_reviews.title: I had to experiment to find the right consistency of added water in order to keep the product.
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this as a thermal protection for blow drying and flat iron smoothing my fine hair. It works but I had to thin it quite a bit with filtered water. Otherwise, it made my hair gummy and greasy the following morning.
customer_reviews.author: DAC in Asheville

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. The large little is cheaper but I keep a small bottle around and refill it. The large bottle is hard to hold and spray with wet hands! Great for removing tangles AND for putting some smooth spring in my curls!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H.

customer_reviews.title: So...SHINY & SMOOTH!
customer_reviews.text: Woah! I have STRAIGHT, medium/long blonde hair, and I haven't gotten a haircut in about a year due to time constraints and just plain laziness. I noticed the ends of my hair were not calming down (split ends...) even when I flat ironed them and used the CHI keratin mist spray. One use of this magic stuff, and my hair is so shiny! I may even go another six months without a haircut, because this stuff does such a great job of calming down those split ends, frayed ends, frizzies, and all those other annoying little quirks.
customer_reviews.author: JleeDay

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product if they shipped the correct size.
customer_reviews.text: It is great, what an awesome product. However, they charged me for 2, 4oz bottles, but shipped 2, 2oz bottles. Not sure if this is a trick or just a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: JKMudGirl

customer_reviews.title: Gives my hair a nice shine.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as recommended by my hairdresser. I was looking for something to give my hair a nice shine and make it more manageable. This product accomplished all that. I color my hair and blow it dry, so it has a tendency to look dry, even though I condition it. Really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Happy hair in a bottle.......
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my umpteenth bottle of this. I am a bleached blond and this stuff makes my hair shiny and very manageable. I see a difference without it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best hair products I have ever used.  I would like to thank Amazon for offering It's  A ten!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far the. BEST leave in conditioner I have ever used so I bought everything...shampoo, conditioner with Keratin and the leave in conditioner. My hair transformation from color damage after only 2 days of use, my hair feels incredible and the name It's a Ten is the perfect name! I can't stop feeling my hair, running my hands through it ... It is so soft, silky with no tangles after even sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Homsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT’S A 10 !!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the leave in conditioning sprays by It’s a 10 !!! I’ve tried them all but this one, with keratin, is my favorite go to spray. It leaves my hair silky soft. Do make sure to not use too much as it can turn your hair greasy if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Gal CO

customer_reviews.title: A savior for your dry, straw-like hair
customer_reviews.text: Though I've been getting my hair colored for 15 years, I've never had any issues with its health until recently. To my dismay, I've noticed my ends have been looking a bit frizzy and straw-like lately. Through multi-tasting, also known as panicking and internet searching, I came across It's a 10 products and decided to try this leave in conditioner. After a mere two days, my brittle ends have come back to life! I'm honestly shocked by how quick and effective this product is, especially when there are so many "dud" products on the market. So satisfied with my purchase that I also ordered a hair mask from the company!
customer_reviews.author: coolitbrittneyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Oh This is Fantastic Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter with the thickest and tangliest hair! This stuff works like a dream. Spray brush Flip spray brush and all better. We both love it and she really loves the way it smells. I am going to have to buy my own bottle because she doesn't want to share with me!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Adams

customer_reviews.title: Staple item for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle for my hair. I highlight and go in the sun, so I use this to help prevent damage. Anytime I go into a salon, they ask me what I use because my hair is soft. I use it about 4 times a week when I get out of the shower. I also get this for my mother who frequently bleaches her hair and had straw-textured hair before she started using this. We're both hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie18

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and have used it for several years. My hair is color treated and this helps with tangles and leaves my hair softer and more manageable. Light, fresh scent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was for my Mom because it was recommended by her hairdresser
customer_reviews.text: This was for my Mom because it was recommended by her hairdresser. She said she likes it and it is easy to use and makes her hair feel good. She's 87 and has arthritis in her hands so it must be easy to pump and maneuver about. Its a go for us. We'll be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My hair appears thin but my hair dresser says that I have alot of hair but it is fine hair. I also highlight my hair with blonde highlights. I have a very hard time combing thru my hair after i wash because it tangles very bad. This leave in product has helped so much with the tangles and leaves my hair with much needed moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth hair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leave-in conditioner to help with my split-ends and repairing my almost-dead hair. I think it works great! My hair feels silky smooth after I use it. I spray it on after washing my hair when it's damp, then blow dry. I think it really locks in the moisture and does exactly what it's meant to.
customer_reviews.author: Mckaela Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I have ordered this several times for me and my 3 year old daughters who have thick, long hair. The name is kind of silly but the product is fabulous. It is not too heavy that it weighs down hair but is perfect for taming it and allowing a solid brush through. Now that my hair is shorter, i use less of it but it still helps keep my hair smooth and in line. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kimwithak

customer_reviews.title: Only product I'll use
customer_reviews.text: My thick wavy hair looks so much better when I use this product. I apply to damp hair and it dries smoother and shinier. I go very minimal on my hair care routine, so it's great to have a product that does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Tara A Lacheney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and is a really good deranged. This is the best leave in conditioner spray I have used. It also smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Zuspan

customer_reviews.title: Will likely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells and works great. My daughter has asked me to buy this on more than one occasion, and I’m sure I’ll be asked again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My stylist asked what is different because my hair is so healthy and this is the only change. I still blow dry and heat curl so this is a win win!
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It’s my nieces favorite hair product. Her hair is fine and super curly. She says it makes her hair soft, no frizz and workable.
customer_reviews.author: Netti51

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff, I think it's a little more nourishing than the formula without the keratin. However, I don't think that this product alone will leave your hair as soft as you'd like if you hair is extremely damaged like mine - I went blonde 2 years ago and didn't take care of it like I should have. If I use this spray in conjunction with another argan oil or something else thats heavy on my ends, then it does come out pretty soft. I'll purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Prendegast

customer_reviews.title: No idea how it works for my hair but my beard has never been softer
customer_reviews.text: I got this stuff because I was looking for anything with keratin to help take some of the bristle out of my beard, and this stuff has really done the trick. I brush in 4-5 pumps every day (spray it on your hands and rub it in, don't spray yourself in the face!) and after about 2 months, my beard has gone from "crunchy" to smooth and decent looking - even at the slightly fuller length I'm wearing these days. It doesn't have much of a smell (that I can detect) and what little it does have seems to vanish as soon as the stuff dries.
customer_reviews.author: DizziD

customer_reviews.title: Great for frizzy and dry hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes my hair really soft and reduces frizz. It lasts a long time so it pays off. Bought it the first time in a swat meet and ran out 4 months after. Seeing this product in stores was way too pricey for me so I was glad I could find it here for a WAY better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Hairdresser recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years on my long hair. Love it! It makes combing wet hair out so easy. My hairdresser introduced this product to me years ago.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I'm keeping it as a once a month buy! It smells like coconut & males your hair soft & helps a great deal with tangles!!
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Will always use this from now on!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this spray! I have thin hair that can become oily easily and have to wash it everyday. I was concerned this would make my hair more oily and weigh it down, but it didn't at all! My hair feels softer and is much more manageable. Definitely protecting my hair from heat and my ends are looking great much longer after a trim. The scent is pleasant, but what is great is that it does not linger, as I can be sensitive if something is too fragrant. I am already on my second bottle and turned my mother in law into a fan as well. Recommend it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, because of how it leaves my hair to dry, how soft it is and how it handles it.
customer_reviews.author: Syl De Luna

customer_reviews.title: It's a 10 Leave-In Conditioner Plus Keratin
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product because it's really nice. I started using this after my hairdresser used it in the salon and I really love how it makes my hair feel. After shampooing, you just spray on your hair and comb it through. Then you blow dry and your hair feels really good and smooth. It's a 10 is just one of those products that helps in the daily maintenance of your hair, especially if you blow dry and use a flat iron all the time like I do. I'll keep using it and suggest you give it a try too.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Does a wonderful job taking out frizz, doesn’t dry hair.
customer_reviews.text: Always use it on my hair after shampooing and conditioning. Combs right through snarls, leaves hair manageable. Can’t be without this product.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! It works extremely well for my medicine thick, naturally wavy/curly hair. Leaves it feeling soft with minimal frizz. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on Ethnic Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have dry hair and do not get Keratin treatments. However, I am aware that products containing keratin is good for our hair. I sprayed this in my hair and combing through my hair was an absolute breeze. My hair was not at all tangled. When my hair dryed...I was thinking, well ok...but when I flat ironed it, my hair looked amazing!!! It has that dominican blowout look and is so shiny and bouncy. I highly recommend this for anyone who has kinky curly hair who wants to have a good detangler. I look forward to my next wash to see how my hair turns out with a roller set. My money was well spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Revived my hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! I have very thick hair, and I also straighten/blowdry/curl it almost every day. I needed something to boost shine and protect/repair my hair. This product does an amazing job of nourishing my hair and bringing it back to life!! And it smells great too. I started out with the 4oz to test it out, and am now ordering the 10oz. I love this stuff and it is going to become a staple of mine.
customer_reviews.author: juners

customer_reviews.title: Healthy looking hi all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love my miracle leave-in conditioner. I use it whether I am leaving my hair wet for better looking waves or drying my hair straight. My hair looks healthier every time I use it
customer_reviews.author: Brynsky

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair impossible to run a brush through when drying, felt like I was pulling it out it made knots in my hair and it frizzed like crazy after when dry.
customer_reviews.author: SCB

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best leave in conditioner I have ever tried before. My hair is overprocessed and flat ironed everyday so it's dried out looking after two uses of this my hair looks baby soft and silky.I can't say enough about this.Some people saying this is counterfeit. I don't believe it to be true this stuff is just absolutely perfect. My new go to.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Bad product quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the past five years and buying them from Ulta. It makes my hair soft and shiny. But the product I bought from Amazon cost $6 cheaper but it does not work at all. It might be a fake as it made my hair frizzy and dry.
customer_reviews.author: rosalyn ryers

customer_reviews.title: Does the job! My only concern is that ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! My only concern is that ever since I started using this product, after wash my hair is very sticky! I need to apply this product in order to be able to comb it! I guess this makes sense. Why else would I use this product if it didn't make my hair sticky and fixed it right after I apply it =/
customer_reviews.author: lisa13

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this isn't the product for my hair, but I'm not noticing the wonders and benefits that others seem to after using this product. No shine, no 'healthy feel', no nothing--plus it smells pretty weird, like something I wouldn't want to have someone smell in my hair. I'm guessing I don't reap the awesome benefits because I rarely straighten my hair and keep it in it's natural curly-coily state. Overall: Not feeling it, but don't let that discourage you from buying it! What may not work for others may work for you...
customer_reviews.author: Product Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: If i'm not careful it could make my hair took too oily. I spray it about 2-3 times only around the bottom of my hair. Very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Mamamia

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: A great leave-in conditioner that is a nice gift for most hair types to moisturize and strengthen.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your hair silky and smooth!!
customer_reviews.text: After my most recent salon visit where my colorist used this on my hair, I knew I had to buy it. I was a little skeptical about purchasing it on Amazon based on a few reviews claiming the product was fake, but I followed through anyway. I’m glad I did, because this is the real deal. I used it tonight and my hair feels INCREDIBLE. It is super soft and silky. One thing to note: I towel dried my hair and sprayed this only on the middle and end portions of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hong

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the 10 Miracle leave-in conditioner you only need a little to keep your hair straight with all the humidity I'm wearing my hair straight and this is helping a lot the smell is divine
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Strange odor
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I’ve been using regularly. It works really well and smells great. I was very disappointed with this purchase as it has an awful odor — almost a rancid smell. Will not reorder from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly L

customer_reviews.title: Spray Error
customer_reviews.text: Does good to my hair however , I’ve order 2 bottles so far and they quit spraying . I literally have to get it out without the lid on..
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Adds shine without weighing your hair down
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My hair is very fine and this product doesn’t weigh it down and it really adds shine and helps to keep my hair healthy as I do color it all year. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Brent Neff

customer_reviews.title: Great for bleached/highlighted hair
customer_reviews.text: There is not one bad thing I can say about this product. I have just recently went back to blonde and very quickly. This has done wonders for my hair. It’s so soft and the scent is great too! Definitely something I will keep!
customer_reviews.author: Barbells&Books

customer_reviews.title: Only one product work other was defected
customer_reviews.text: Bottle did not work and didn’t spray. The inside was gummy like. The first bottle work perfect but not the second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: bina forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leave in conditioner! Have bought multiple times. Love the bigger bottle to keep at home and the smaller bottle to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: N Jervis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff so much so when I saw thw savings for this two pack I grabbed it up.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this Beni brush my hair. It helps a lot not to pull out as much hair and combs easily through.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: eliminates the frizz
customer_reviews.text: the only product has worked on my frizzy hair! I have tried everything I guess and this is the only one that works not like a miracle but it works at least!
customer_reviews.author: kimbuchabucha

customer_reviews.title: To make things worse, the pump that releases the cream did not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item hoping it would really work well and help control my frizzy hair. I did not do anything for my hair! To make things worse, the pump that releases the cream did not work at all, I had to remove the cap and the pump in order to pour some of the product in my hands. That's a hassle! Why having a pump to release the product if it will not work properly??? I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: No more frizzy hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair dresser introduced me to this product years ago and WOW! I have tried so so many products and there is nothing that tops 10 Miracle Leave-In Plus Keratin! My hair is naturally curly and my husband loves it long and straight. I never could het the frizz out of it until I started using the 10 Miracle products and this one is my favorite. Amazon has the best price. I have recommended it hundreds of times to coworkers and friends. There just isn't anything that can top it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 10 - NOT EVEN A 1
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing for my hair. And the product is so thick that you cannot use the spray bottle to spray it on your hair. I have highlights on my hair that are dry and I was hoping this would help. So disappointed......
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Detangler
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product on and off for a little over 2 years. I found it in Ulta and I loved it! It started being sold in most drug stores. Now I just order it on Amazon whenever I order my body wash. I love the product, I have thin, dry, brittle hair. It takes knots out and leaves my hair feeling super silky and clean. I can’t use a lot of the product because it’s heavy on thin hair, but it’s awesome i’ll continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and shiny
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks better after one use than it has been for awhile. So far this product has met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Keratin Product
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I love this stuff! Most keratin products leaves my hair dry and weird feeling, but this stuff feeds my hair the protein it needs yet leaves my hair so soft and touchable. I only use every other week and already I can tell my hair is not breaking off like before. I still got it cheaper here than the beauty stores. This is the only product from the Its A 10 line I will use. Please continue to offer this for everyone who uses it!
customer_reviews.author: allhunny

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product
customer_reviews.text: I love the "Its a 10" products. I have used them for years. People with wavy to curly hair and people with hard water will find this product amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scott

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST AWESOME HAIR CARE PRODUCT ON THE MARKET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! It's just like getting a keratin treatment without the unbelieveably high pricetag! Wonderfully taming frizzy, wirey, unmanageable hair without the heaviness of an oily product that makes your hair look as though its full of grease or weighing it down. Just a few quick sprits untangles and tames your hair. Wonderful with a high temperature straightener and/or curling iron! My overall FAVORITE hair care product EVER!!! Lasts a long time, too! TRY IT!
customer_reviews.author: chynamarie1

product_meta.title: It's a 10 Haircare Miracle Leave-In Plus Keratin, 4 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: NOURISHING: Our Miracle Leave-In Spray is a great addition to your hair care routine to help condition, smooth, and maintain keratin straightening treatments while leaving your hair feeling silky, smooth, and strong
REPAIR & REBUILD: This lightweight conditioner spray helps penetrate deep into the root of your hair to rebuild dry and damaged hair from the inside, out
HEAT PROTECTANT: Use to help protect hair from natural damage such as sunlight and heat and leave hair healthier from the inside and out
HOW TO USE: Hair’s most important nutrient, keratin, is a powerhouse of revitalization and can be used straight out of the shower as a detangler or as a heat-protectant spray.

FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: No matter your hair type, this hard working helper gives curls soft, frizz-free definition and makes straight styles mirror-smooth, all while making your hair healthier with every application
